topics.body:
Here's some good news: the usa supreme court may rule on gay marriage instead of just punting it back to the states.  They're going to decide whether or not to hear a upcoming case.

Tl:dr; gay marriage may be legal in all 50 states in the usa by late June 2015.

topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5428d456636872245f230100#post_5428d456636872245f230100
Personally I'm one of those believers that think it'll be legalized before 2016 cause while the current supreme court may be biased towards conservatives the thing people forget is that the justices are first and foremost judges; while yes three out of the current judges are biased they are first and foremost judges.

What's probably going to happen:
"Well shit; I don't want gay marriage to be legal, but we can't find a legal defense guys."
"Double shit; he's totally right"


My money is on gay marriage is legalized 5-4 and then years of political drama shit with social conservatives vowing to repeal gay marriage, but never actually succeeding to do so.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
